item.title: Docs: Install StorageOS
item.description:
Only installations of StorageOS with CSI are supported for AKS.

Visit the [best practices page]( {%link _docs/platforms/azure-aks/bestpractices/index.md %}) for production deployment advice.

 

{% include operator/install.md %}
